name: Space And Time (Random7)
description:
Little 2D space fight game that was made for the Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022.

My Brother and I worked on it for the past week, There is much more work to be done, but this is the version I'm submitting to the Game Jam.

Game Info:

Recharge your Respawn gage so you can rewind time and return back more powerful then when you started.

You'll need several rewinds to be able to defeat the enemy forces!

Every Time you kill an enemy you will notice your respawn and power bars increase.

Once the Respawn bar is full, you can respawn, and once the power bar is full, your weapons get stronger.

Controls:

You can use Keyboard or Controller.  Recommended to use controller.

Controller:

  • Controller Right stick to move
  • Right trigger to fire weapon 1
  • Right bumper to boost
  • Left trigger to fire weapon 2

Keyboard:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to fire weapon 1
  • Shift to boost
  • Control to fire weapon 2
